properties.name: Body Worlds at the Museum of Nature and Science
properties.description: Posted by Tshein   1318 S 2nd Ave # 31, Dallas, TXOur project team saw the Body Worlds exhibit here. Both horrific and educating at the same time. Quite interesting.

properties.name: Cooper Hewitt National Design Museum
properties.description: Posted by Tshein  2 East 91st Street New York, NY 10128The Design Life Now exhibition was great, especially the huge kidrobot chalk Dunny (which I signed in Chinese). There was a light structure wall with a camera that translated your profile into a lit image. Fast company article on kidrobot at Cooper-Hewitt: http://www.fastcompany.com/subscr/113/open_features-beyond-plastic.html

properties.name: Cuba Libre Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Tshein  2822 N Henderson Ave, 752062/7/07 - Following a project outing to see BodyWorks at the Science Museum at Fair Park, the team ate here. The blackened salmon was great, as were the myriad of specialty tacos.

properties.name: Doubletree Club Hotel Jersey City
properties.description: Posted by Tshein 455 Washington Blvd, Jersey City, NJ

properties.name: First client project at Accenture
properties.description: Posted by Tshein2003 - 2004 - My first experience at Accenture was on a massive SAP upgrade project at AstraZeneca in Wilmington , DE. The headquarters was down the street, but they placed the contractors and many IT resources in these rented offices spaces. The project was so successful that it was displayed prominently in external marketing brochures given to clients.

properties.name: Han Ah Reum
properties.description: Posted by Tshein 321 Broad Ave, Ridgefield, NJHuge Korean shopping mall, grocery store, and restaurants.

properties.name: McKesson
properties.description: Posted by Tshein1220 Senlac Dr, Carrollton, TX 75006This is my current client. They\'re a massive fortune 16, 3B/year middle-man company, delivering pharmaceuticals and healthcare products from companies like Pfizer and J&J to receipients like Wal-Mart, hospitals, and local pharmas.

properties.name: Rickshaw Dumpling Bar
properties.description: Posted by Tshein 61 West 23rd Street, 10010Dumpling shop with a modern flair that churns out dumplings at amazing speed. Owner Kenny Lao built the restaurant off of the business plan that won him the business plan competition while he was at NYU\'s Stern b-school.

properties.name: Won Jo (Korean BBQ)
properties.description: Posted by Tshein125 West 45th St, 10022Weekends are the best time to visit this place as they use wood chips for the BBQ, giving the best flavor. The vegetable tempura is great.
